sentences: Taz got his start as a founding member of the local Dallas punk band, The Assassins, and is probably best known for his work with The Reverend Horton Heat, Burden Brothers and session work with Izzy Stradlin and Duff McKagan of Guns Nâ€™ Roses.

Taz has most recently performed with Burden Brothers, Dwarves, Hell Texas, and 76, which includes Terry Glaze (Pantera, Lord Tracey, and Raised by Gods), Kinley Wolfe (The Cult, American Fuse, and Lord Tracy) and Brian Harris (Queen for a Day, Lord Tracy).
